src:
Ko injekcija popusti, zares ni prijetno
Rok Tičar med udarnimi risi na uvodnem zboru sezone. Po dobrem desetletju se je vrnil na Švedsko.
06 Nov 2019, 10:54 by Siniša Uroševič
BLED – Po navadi na novembrskih reprezentančnih zborih, uvodnih za hokejske reprezentance v sezoni, selektorji na svoje sezname še ne vpišejo vseh udarnih adutov. Tudi pri moštvu Matjaža Kopitarja je zdaj podobno, a hkrati bo danes na letalu proti prizorišču turnirja v Latviji tudi nekaj izkušenih risov. Med njimi bo Rok Tičar, ki po dobrem desetletju spet igra na Švedskem.Hokejska pot tridesetletnika in sploh zadnjega učenca doslej z imenitnimi ocenami jeseniške hokejske šole je zelo pisana. Pri reprezentanci mu je pogosto pripadala ena ključnih vlog, nepozabni so njegovi trije goli na odločilni tekmi olimpijskih kvalifikacij v Minsku proti domači Belorusiji za uvrstitev v Pjongčang. Viden pečat je zapustil v KHL in nemškem prvenstvu, prej kajpak tudi v domači Podmežakli. Zdaj igra za Oskarshamn, novo moštvo v najvišjem ligaškem razredu na Švedskem."Odlično smo startali, bili tik pod vrhom lestvice in si takrat najbrž mislili, da je vse skupaj lažje od pričakovanj. A pozneje smo doživljali tudi poraze, dva sta bila visoka (nazadnje v Jönköpingu z 1:7 – o. p.). Četudi nista razkrila vsega, kar se je dogajalo na ledu, saj v igri nismo bili toliko slabši, takšni izidi bolijo," prizna dolgoletni reprezentant, a obenem verjame, da se bo njegovemu novemu moštvu spet odprlo: "Lepo je priti v ambiciozno slačilnico z jedrom mladih igralcev. Ohranjajo prijaznost, imajo veliko hokejskega talenta, ne nazadnje gre večinoma za hokejiste, ki so si pomladi prvič v klubski zgodovini priborili uvrstitev v prestižno najvišje ligaško tekmovanje na Švedskem." 
Osvežil si bo spomin
Švedsko in njen pristop k hokeju z zelo veliko drsanja in discipline na ledu je Tičar spoznal že v najstniških letih, pri klubu Timrå, zdaj mu koristi tudi osnovno znanje švedščine, ki se je je takrat naučil. Pozneje se mu je hokejska pot prepletala med domačimi Jesenicami, Nemčijo, Slovaško, Rusijo in Kitajsko. Navijači so ga imeli posebno radi v Bratislavi in Kölnu, tam je zadnji dve tekmi prejšnje sezone v polfinalu končnice proti Mannheimu igral kljub poškodovani preponi: "Poskusil sem stisniti zobe, pred vsako tekmo sem dobil protibolečinsko injekcijo. Ni bilo prijetno, ko učinka injekcije ni bilo več ..."Tako je moral izpustiti svetovno prvenstvo skupine B v Kazahstanu. "Žal sem moral to prvenstvo spremljati od doma. Vem, da so se fantje kot vedno trudili po najboljših močeh, a v športu ti ne gre vedno vse po željah." Turnir, ki se bo v Liepaji ob Baltskem morju začel jutri, je za moštvo koristen: "Igrali bomo proti tem kakovostnim selekcijam domače Latvije, Belorusije in Francije, čas bo tudi za pogovore med nami kot tudi s selektorjem. Tisti, ki smo z Matjažem Kopitarjem že delali, si bomo osvežili spomin, mlajši bodo spoznavali podrobnosti dela."Sicer pa je prav reprezentant iz Oskarshamna pri omenjenem selektorju po navadi igral na zelo visoki ravni. "Uf, nekaj časa je že minilo, ko smo bili z njim prvič skupaj na SP v Bratislavi 2011," je dejal. Spomini so lepi, a zdaj Gorenjec že odšteva do februarskega uvoda v olimpijske kvalifikacije in aprilskega začetka SP skupine B.
text:
When the injection is discounted, it is not really pleasant
Rock Ticar during the shocks of the season's inaugural choir. After a decade or so, he returned to Sweden.
06 Nov 2019, 10:54 by Sinisa Ferizaj
BLED - As a rule, the select teams do not yet have all of their trump cards on the November National Hockey Championships, the season's hockey team. The situation with Matjaz Kopitar is similar now, but at the same time today there will be some experienced lynx on the plane against the tournament venue in Latvia. Among them will be Rok Tičar, who has been playing in Sweden for over a decade. The hockey path of the 30-year-old and the last pupil so far, with excellent grades from the Autumn Hockey School is very colorful. He often played one of the key roles in the national team, unforgettable are his three goals in the decisive match of the Olympic qualifications in Minsk against native Belarus to qualify for Pyongyang. He left a prominent mark in the KHL and German Championships, and earlier in the domestic Podmežakli. He is now playing for Oskarshamn, a new team in the top league class in Sweden. "We started great, were just below the top of the league and at that time we thought it was easier than expected. But later we also suffered defeats, two were high ( last time at Jönköping at 1: 7 - op.) Even though they didn't reveal everything that was happening on the ice, because we weren't so bad in the game, such outcomes hurt, "the longtime national team admits, but at the same time believes that his new team will reopened: "It's nice to get into an ambitious locker room with a core of young players. They remain friendly, have a lot of hockey talent, not least for the hockey players who earned a place in the prestigious top league competition in Sweden for the first time in club history."
It will refresh your memory
Sweden and her approach to ice hockey with a great deal of ice skating and ice discipline, learned from his teens at the Timrå club, now also benefiting from the basic knowledge of Swedish he learned at the time. Later, his hockey path was intertwined between his native Jesenice, Germany, Slovakia, Russia and China. Fans especially loved him in Bratislava and Cologne, where he played last two games last season in the semi-finals of the playoffs against Mannheim: "I tried to clench my teeth, I got a painkiller before every game. It was not pleasant when the effect of the injection was not it was more ... "So he had to miss the Group B World Cup in Kazakhstan. "Unfortunately, I had to follow this championship from home. I know that the boys have always done their best, but in sports you do not always want everything." The tournament, which will start tomorrow in Liepaja by the Baltic Sea, is beneficial for the team: "We will play against these quality selections of home Latvia, Belarus and France, and it will be time for talks between us as well as the coach. Those of us who are Matjaz The equines have already worked, the memory will be refreshed, the younger ones will get to know the details of the work. ”The Oskarshamn national team usually played at a very high level with the coach. "Uh, it's been a while since we were together for the first time at the 2011 SP in Bratislava," he said. The memories are beautiful, but now Gorenjec is already counting down to the February introduction to the Olympic qualifications and the start of the Group B World Championships in April.
